alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 5:44PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lander, southwestern Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 543 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crescent Valley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlin, Beowawe, Palisade, Crescent Valley, Emigrant Pass and portions of I-80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
